interface.name: Website Id
interface.description: Website Id to be tracked, otherwise it will default to use '1'.

interface.name: default SiteId
interface.description: set a possibly sane default SiteId

interface.name: Piwik URL (REQUIRED)
interface.description: Root URL of your working Piwik installation. 'https://piwik-install.yourdomain.com'. Do not add a trailing '/' character. Should be utilizing SSL for security purposes but using a schemeless URL '//host.tld' is valid also. Leaving empty will use '/piwik'

interface.name: Track visitors across all subdomains (WIP)
interface.description:
So if one visitor visits x.example.com and y.example.com, they will be counted as a unique visitor.
Equivalent to "_paq.push(["setCookieDomain", "*.example.com"]);"

interface.name: Prepend the site domain to the page title when tracking (WIP)
interface.description: So if someone visits the 'About' page on blog.example.com it will be recorded as 'blog / About'. This is the easiest way to get an overview of your traffic by sub-domain.

interface.name: In the "Outlinks" report, hide clicks to known alias URLs (WIP)
interface.description: So clicks on links to Alias URLs (eg. http://*.example.com) will not be counted as "Outlink".

interface.name: Enable client side DoNotTrack detection.
interface.description: So tracking requests will not be sent if visitors do not wish to be tracked. Note: If server side DoNotTrack support has been enabled, this option will have no effect.

interface.name: Debugger
interface.description: Enable or disable the logging, performance, and errors debug output to the Javascript console. Leave this disabled unless you are having issues and would like to know more about what is going on.

description: An open source Piwik Analytics CloudFlare application that helps add your tracking information to web pages. Some features are still a "Work in Progress" (WIP). Click "Setup" to modify your tracking options. Be sure to click "Update" to save after modifying.
name: Piwik Analytics
